WRITING.TEXT: The Godfather.. Probably tried to watch the first part long long time ago.. gave up after 20min. Never got back to it!

about 3 hrs in, we were walking to the next nightclub.. she was walking ahead of me .. thats when I noticed.. and i was like.. HOLY SHIT !!! How the hell did I miss that all this while!!! Not for once that made any difference to what I thought / felt about her.. I was just shocked at myself! She was wearing a long sleve jacket.

This kinda happened to me too! I didn't notice my wife's (then girlfriend) missing arm until 3-4 hours of the first time we met! It was late evening, we went to a couple of pubs / nightclubs! Still the best night ever!

WRITING.TITLE: In Chandigarh, Man Pays 8.1 Lakh for a VIP Number For Rs 50,000 Scooter
Chinese theme park sets up 'death simulator'

WRITING.TEXT: This should become a meme! something on the lines of - you expect me to be impressed???

WRITING.TITLE: With smart watches like Apple watch and others gaining popularity, its about time to start thinking about laws around using those while driving! Just like we have laws about using the mobile while driving.
WRITING.TEXT: Receiving a text on a smart watch while driving can be just as dangerous. Answering a call .. probably not. But receiving a text or other notifications while driving can be very distracting while driving.
Half of that was in 1947 when India got Independence. Population of india then - roughly 350 million!
Maximum utilization of all the technologies OP has.

WRITING.TITLE: A man lost 31 members of his family (including extended) due to the earthquake in Nepal. The whole family was together for a religious ceremony.

WRITING.TEXT: My empty coffee mug! I hope zombies are allergic to the smell of caffeine!
